parameterdescription.para: UI callback handler. Can be NULL to disable callbacks.

simplesect.para: 0 on success or negative error value on failure.

briefdescription.para: Sets a LED's state. Only the one LED is affected, the rest of the LED pattern is preserved. Only has effect if the specified LED is not controlled by PWM.

parameterdescription.para: 0 turns the LED off, a non-zero value turns the LED on.

simplesect.para: 0 on success or negative error value on failure.

briefdescription.para: Get the state of a button.

simplesect.para: 1 if button is active, 0 if it's inactive.

parameterdescription.para: Frequency. If set to 0, the buzzer is disabled. The frequency is limited to the range 100 - 10 000 Hz.
Intensity of the buzzer output. If set to 0, the buzzer is disabled. The frequency is limited to the range 0 - 100 %.

simplesect.para: 0 on success or negative error value on failure.

briefdescription.para: Write value to pin controlling NMOS transistor.

parameterdescription.para: 1 sets high signal on NMOS gate, 0 sets it low.

simplesect.para: 0 on success or negative error value on failure.
0 on success or negative error value on failure.

detaileddescription.para: Module that handles user interaction through button, RGB LED and buzzer.
